definitions.title: vb. denom. Hiph.
definitions.body: give ear, listen, hear, almost wholly poet.—Pf. [[הֶאֱזִין]] De 1:45; [[וְהַאֲזִין]] consec. Ps 77:2 (v. De Kö:1, p. 390); [[וְהַאֲזַנְתָּ֫]] Ex 15:26; [[הֶאֱזִינוּ]] Is 64:3 +; Impf. [[יַאֲזִין]] Job 9:16 +; [[אָזִין]] (for [[אַאֲזִין]]) Job 32:11, etc.; Imv. ms. [[הַאֲזִ֫ינׇה]] Nu 23:18 +; fs. [[הַאֲזִ֫יּנִי]] Is 1:2; fpl. [[הַאֲזֵ֫נׇּה]] Ge 4:23, Is 32:9, etc.; Pt. [[מֵזִין]] (for [[מַאֲזִין]] v. Kö:1, 391) Pr 17:4; —

hear, perceive by the ear, abs. Is 64:3 (‖[[שׁמע]]) Ps 135:17; give ear, listen, abs. (of mts. personif.) De 32:1, cf. Is 1:2 (of earth, personif.); of men Ju Jdg 5:3, Ps 49:2, Is 28:23, Joe 1:2 (all ‖[[שׁמע]]) Ho 5:1 (‖[[שׁמע]], [[הִקְשִׁיב]]) Is 8:9; sq. acc. rei Ge 4:23, Job 33:1, Is 1:10, Is 32:9 (all ‖[[שׁמע]]) Is 42:23 (‖[[שׁמע]], [[הקשׂיב]]); Job 37:14 (‖[[הִתְבּוֹנֵן]]); Ps 78:1 sq. [[על]] (rei) Pr 17:4 (‖[[הִקְשִׁיב]]); sq. [[עַד]] (rei) Job 32:11 (‖[[הוֹחַלְתִּי]]); hearken to, = be obedient to, abs. Je 13:15 (‖[[שׁמע]]) 2Ch 24:19, Ne 9:30; c. acc. rei Job 9:16; [[לְ]] (rei) Job 34:16 (‖[[שׁמע]]) Ex 15:26; sq. [[לְ]] pers. Job 34:2 (‖[[שׁמע]]); sq. [[עָדַי]] pers. Nu 23:18; sq. [[אֶל־]] pers. Is 51:4.
